meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>study</kanji> <kanji>period of time</kanji> isn't the pitiful amount of time you spend studying. It's something much bigger: the <vocabulary>school term</vocabulary>. Ugh, how much longer is this study period of time???
readingMnemonic: The reading is on'yomi because it's a jukugo word but がく gets shortened to がっ, so be careful. Maybe you just wish the school term would get shorter which is why you shortened がく like that?
